get.description: By passing in the appropriate options, you can get a list of cities by starting with the ZIP code first or city first

parameters.name: Licence
parameters.description: Pass the license given by DQE

parameters.name: CodePostal
parameters.description: Pass a postal code or a city

parameters.name: Pays
parameters.description: Pass a country code (ISO 3 letters)

parameters.name: Etendue
parameters.description: Pass an optional value to authorize the search by atleast 2 digits in CodePostal

parameters.name: Instance
parameters.description: Pass an optional instance

parameters.name: Version
parameters.description: Pass an optional value "1.1" to disable the fill of "Lieu-dit" in the "Localite" field

post.description: By passing in the appropriate options, you can get a list of cities by starting with the ZIP code first or city first

get.summary: Get a list of a street's numbers

parameters.name: CodePostal

get.summary: Get a list of additional address informations
get.description: By passing in the appropriate options, you can get a list of address additional informations

parameters.description: Pass the license given by DQE

parameters.name: Pays
parameters.description: Pass a country code (ISO 3 letters)

parameters.name: IDVoie
parameters.description: Pass the unique code of the street

parameters.name: IDNum
parameters.description: Pass the number of the street inwhich the additional information search will be done

parameters.name: Taille
parameters.description: Pass an integer value to reduce the number of characters in the response

200.description: Get a list of additional address informations

get.summary: Get an address from a single line address form
get.description: By passing in the appropriate options, you can get a valid address from a part of an address

parameters.name: Licence
parameters.description: Pass the license given by DQE

parameters.name: Pays
parameters.description: Pass the country code (ISO 3 letters)

parameters.name: Adresse
parameters.description: Pass the part of the address

parameters.name: Taille
parameters.description: Pass an integer value to limit the number of caracters in the response

parameters.name: NbMax
parameters.description: Pass an interver value to limit the number of suggestion in the response

parameters.name: Version
parameters.description: Pass the value "1" to fill the type of street in the response

parameters.name: Instance
parameters.description: Pass an optional instance

post.summary: Get an address from a single line address form
post.description: By passing in the appropriate options, you can get a valid address from a part of an address

get.summary: Check an address without data entry help
get.description: By passing in the appropriate options, you can validate an address

parameters.name: Licence
parameters.description: Pass the license given by DQE

parameters.name: Pays
parameters.description: Pass a country code (ISO 3 letters)

parameters.name: Adresse
parameters.description: Pass the full address to be checked "Addtional|Address|Place called|Postal code|City"

parameters.name: Taille
parameters.description: Pass an integer value to reduce the number of characters in the response

parameters.name: Instance
parameters.description: Pass an optional instance

parameters.name: Proposition
parameters.description: Pass a value to allow suggestions ("O")

200.description: Get the result of the check

post.summary: Check an address without data entry help
post.description: By passing in the appropriate options, you can validate an address

200.description: Get the result of the check

Latitude.description: Latitude of the address if subscribed

Longitude.description: Longitude of the address if subscribed

Status_IrisIlot.description: Source of the Iris or Ilot information (if subscribed)

iris.description: Iris code of the address (if subscribed)

ilot.description: Ilot code but it is not used anymore (if subscribed)

Licence.description: Pass the license given by DQE

CodePostal.description: Pass a postal code or a city

Etendue.description: Pass an optional value to authorize the search by atleast 2 digits in CodePostal

Version.description: Pass an optional value "1.1" to disable the fill of "Lieu-dit" in the "Localite" field

Licence.description: Pass the license given by DQE

Adresse.description: Pass the part of the address

IDLocalite.description: Pass the unique code of the city
